    AND
    This condition checks two conditions in a compound selector.
    ATTRIBUTE
    This condition checks for the presence of an attribute (and eventually its value).

    This condition checks if the value is in a hypen-separated list of values in a specified attribute.

    This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value.

    This condition checks an id attribute.

    This condition checks the language of the node.
    ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE
    This condition checks for a value in a list of space-separated values in an attribute.

    ONLY_TYPE
    This condition checks if a node is the only one of his type.

    PSEUDO_CLASS
    This condition checks for a pseudo class.
    PSEUDO_ELEMENT
    This condition checks for pseudo elements.
    SELECTOR_ARGUMENT
    This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies.
    SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE
    This condition checks a substring of an attribute value.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • AND

      public static final Condition.ConditionType AND
      This condition checks two conditions in a compound selector.

      Example: 

         .part1:lang(fr)

      See Also:
      CombinatorCondition

    • ID

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ID
      This condition checks an id attribute.

      Example: 

         #myId

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • CLASS

      public static final Condition.ConditionType CLASS
      This condition checks for a specified class.

      Example: 

         .example

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • PSEUDO_CLASS

      public static final Condition.ConditionType PSEUDO_CLASS
      This condition checks for a pseudo class.

      Example: 

         :link
   :visited
   :hover

      See Also:
      PseudoCondition

    • PSEUDO_ELEMENT

      public static final Condition.ConditionType PSEUDO_ELEMENT
      This condition checks for pseudo elements.

      Example: 

         ::first-line
   ::first-letter

      See Also:
      PseudoCondition.getName()

    • POSITIONAL

      public static final Condition.ConditionType POSITIONAL
      This condition checks a specified position.

      Example: 

         :first-child

      See Also:
      PositionalCondition

    • ONLY_CHILD

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ONLY_CHILD
      This condition checks if a node is the only one in the node list.

    • ONLY_TYPE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ONLY_TYPE
      This condition checks if a node is the only one of his type.

    • LANG

      public static final Condition.ConditionType LANG
      This condition checks the language of the node.

      Example: 

         :lang(fr)

      See Also:
      LangCondition

    • ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks for the presence of an attribute (and eventually its value).

      Examples: 

         [simple]
   [restart="never"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks for a value in a list of space-separated values in an attribute.

      Example: 

         [values~="10"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • BEGIN_HYPHEN_ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType BEGIN_HYPHEN_ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks if the value is in a hypen-separated list of values in a specified attribute.

      Example: 

         [languages|="fr"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value.

      Example: 

         [restart^="never"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • ENDS_ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType ENDS_ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks the end of an attribute value.

      Example: 

         [restart$="never"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE

      public static final Condition.ConditionType SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE
      This condition checks a substring of an attribute value.

      Example: 

         [restart*="never"]

      See Also:
      AttributeCondition

    • SELECTOR_ARGUMENT

      public static final Condition.ConditionType SELECTOR_ARGUMENT
      This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies.

      Example: 

         :not(:visited,:hover)

      See Also:
      ArgumentCondition

      Parameters:
